'use strict';
 
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", {
  value: true
});
exports.buildGroupOptions = exports.buildOptions = exports.buildBlankOption = undefined;
 
var _react = require('react');
 
var _react2 = _interopRequireDefault(_react);
 
var _lodash = require('lodash');
 
var _lodash2 = _interopRequireDefault(_lodash);
 
var _DropDownItem = require('./DropDownItem');
 
var _DropDownItem2 = _interopRequireDefault(_DropDownItem);
 
function _interopRequireDefault(obj) { return obj && obj.__esModule ? obj : { default: obj }; }
 
var buildBlankOption = exports.buildBlankOption = function buildBlankOption(handleSelect) {
  var blankItem = { value: null, label: '--' };
 
  return _react2.default.createElement(_DropDownItem2.default, {
    item: blankItem,
    isSelected: false,
    isDisabled: false,
    onClick: handleSelect
  });
};
 
var buildOptions = exports.buildOptions = function buildOptions(items, selectedItem, handleSelect) {
  return items.map(function (item, key) {
    var isSelected = selectedItem && selectedItem.value === item.value;
    var isDisabled = _lodash2.default.get(item, 'disabled', false);
 
    return _react2.default.createElement(_DropDownItem2.default, {
      key: key,
      item: item,
      isSelected: isSelected,
      isDisabled: isDisabled,
      onClick: handleSelect
    });
  });
};
 
var buildGroupOptions = exports.buildGroupOptions = function buildGroupOptions(groups, selectedItem, handleSelect) {
  return groups.map(function (group, key) {
    var options = buildOptions(group.items, selectedItem, handleSelect);
 
    return _react2.default.createElement(
      'div',
      { key: key },
      _react2.default.createElement(
        'div',
        { className: 'dropdown__options__group' },
        group.label
      ),
      options
    );
  });
};
